def.threejs.three

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • def.js.Object
      • def.threejs.three.EventDispatcher
        • def.threejs.three.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxGeometry, CircleGeometry, CylinderGeometry, DodecahedronGeometry, ExtrudeGeometry, LatheGeometry, ParametricGeometry, PlaneGeometry, PolyhedronGeometry, RingGeometry, ShapeGeometry, SphereGeometry, TorusGeometry, TorusKnotGeometry, TubeGeometry

    public class Geometry
extends EventDispatcher
    Base class for geometries # Example var geometry = new THREE.Geometry(); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3( -10, 10, 0 ) ); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3( -10, -10, 0 ) ); geometry.vertices.push( new THREE.Vector3( 10, -10, 0 ) ); geometry.faces.push( new THREE.Face3( 0, 1, 2 ) ); geometry.computeBoundingSphere();
    See Also:
    https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/blob/master/src/core/Geometry.js

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public double id
        Unique number of this geometry instance

      • uuid

        public String uuid

      • name

        public String name
        Name for this geometry. Default is an empty string.

      • type

        public String type

      • vertices

        public Vector3[] vertices
        The array of vertices hold every position of points of the model. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.verticesNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • colors

        public Color[] colors
        Array of vertex colors, matching number and order of vertices. Used in ParticleSystem, Line and Ribbon. Meshes use per-face-use-of-vertex colors embedded directly in faces. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.colorsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • faces

        public Face3[] faces
        Array of triangles or/and quads. The array of faces describe how each vertex in the model is connected with each other. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.elementsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • faceVertexUvs

        public Vector2[][][] faceVertexUvs
        Array of face UV layers. Each UV layer is an array of UV matching order and number of vertices in faces. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.uvsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • morphTargets

        public MorphTarget[] morphTargets
        Array of morph targets. Each morph target is a Javascript object: { name: "targetName", vertices: [ new THREE.Vector3(), ... ] } Morph vertices match number and order of primary vertices.

      • morphNormals

        public MorphNormals[] morphNormals
        Array of morph normals. Morph normals have similar structure as morph targets, each normal set is a Javascript object: morphNormal = { name: "NormalName", normals: [ new THREE.Vector3(), ... ] }

      • skinWeights

        public double[] skinWeights
        Array of skinning weights, matching number and order of vertices.

      • skinIndices

        public double[] skinIndices
        Array of skinning indices, matching number and order of vertices.

      • lineDistances

        public double[] lineDistances

      • boundingBox

        public Box3 boundingBox
        Bounding box.

      • boundingSphere

        public Sphere boundingSphere
        Bounding sphere.

      • verticesNeedUpdate

        public Boolean verticesNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the vertices array has been updated.

      • elementsNeedUpdate

        public Boolean elementsNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the faces array has been updated.

      • uvsNeedUpdate

        public Boolean uvsNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the uvs array has been updated.

      • normalsNeedUpdate

        public Boolean normalsNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the normals array has been updated.

      • colorsNeedUpdate

        public Boolean colorsNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the colors array has been updated.

      • lineDistancesNeedUpdate

        public Boolean lineDistancesNeedUpdate
        Set to true if the linedistances array has been updated.

      • groupsNeedUpdate

        public Boolean groupsNeedUpdate

      • bones

        public Bone[] bones

      • animation

        public AnimationClip animation

      • animations

        public AnimationClip[] animations

        public void computeFaceNormals()
        Computes face normals.

      • computeVertexNormals

        public void computeVertexNormals(Boolean areaWeighted)
        Computes vertex normals by averaging face normals. Face normals must be existing / computed beforehand.

      • computeFlatVertexNormals

        public void computeFlatVertexNormals()
        Compute vertex normals, but duplicating face normals.

      • computeMorphNormals

        public void computeMorphNormals()
        Computes morph normals.

      • computeLineDistances

        public void computeLineDistances()

      • computeBoundingBox

        public void computeBoundingBox()
        Computes bounding box of the geometry, updating Geometry.boundingBox attribute.

      • computeBoundingSphere

        public void computeBoundingSphere()
        Computes bounding sphere of the geometry, updating Geometry.boundingSphere attribute. Neither bounding boxes or bounding spheres are computed by default. They need to be explicitly computed, otherwise they are null.

      • merge

        public void merge(Geometry geometry,
                  Matrix matrix,
                  double materialIndexOffset)

      • mergeMesh

        public void mergeMesh(Mesh mesh)

      • mergeVertices

        public double mergeVertices()
        Checks for duplicate vertices using hashmap. Duplicated vertices are removed and faces' vertices are updated.

      • setFromPoints

        public Geometry setFromPoints(Geometry.ArrayVector2 points)

      • sortFacesByMaterialIndex

        public void sortFacesByMaterialIndex()

public Geometry Clone()
        Creates a new clone of the Geometry.

      • copy

        public Geometry copy(Geometry source)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes The object from memory. Don't forget to call this method when you remove an geometry because it can cuase meomory leaks.
